meanings.definition: To surpass others or be superior in some respect.
meanings.sent1: She excels in math, always getting the highest grades in the class.
meanings.sent2: The athlete excels in running, winning every race effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: Even the squirrels think she excels at climbing trees!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to excel in her studies is like a bright beacon guiding her way.
meanings.sent5: His talent for excelling in sports is truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: To do well; to be outstanding or excellent.
meanings.sent1: He excels in cooking, creating delicious meals for his family.
meanings.sent2: The singer excels in hitting high notes with perfect pitch.
meanings.sent3: The cat thinks he excels at napping all day long!
meanings.sent4: Her ability to excel in problem-solving is like a superpower.
meanings.sent5: The team's spirit of excellence excels in every competition they enter.
